__e: Then Neelix and the others will get out of the way. Absolutely.
You violated that duty, Neelix, and there will be consequences.
I still love Neelix... and I'm not ready to give up on him, no matter what the Doctor says.
Believe me, Neelix, you're making too much of it.
Neelix, you still don't know how to make a pizza... but I'm glad you're here. So am I.
Neelix, she has to be told, but I know she'll be better off having you here to help her through it.
